ExternalReferenceType.title: ExternalRefererence
ExternalReferenceType.description: External references are used to describe pointers to information represented outside of MAEC. For example, a Malware Instance object could use an external reference to indicate an ID for that malware in an external database or a report could use references to represent source material.

source_name.description: The source within which the external-reference is defined (system, registry, organization, etc.).

url.description: A URL reference to an external resource [RFC3986]

external_id.description: An indentifier for the external reference content
